title.value: Monitor is only showing a small part of the full screen

body.value:
The installation process was succesful and you are able to boot, but when logging in you are only able to see a part of the screen (usually the upper right screen corner) with a poor resolution.

This may be why in the BIOS setting (CMOS) not enough RAM was allocated for the screen memory, e.g. 1 MB instead of 8 MB or more. Please check.
